knxUltimateHueZigbeeConnectivity.mapping_info: Link the KNX group address that should reflect the Zigbee connectivity state.
knxUltimateHueZigbeeConnectivity.behaviour_info: Choose whether to read the connectivity state at startup and expose the Node-RED output pin.
knxUltimateHueZigbeeConnectivity.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue connectivity events are still emitted to your flow.
